description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Price Drop! We took Mahjong Moves and improved it.  Better Visibility!  Over 50 Tile Sets!  Advanced Editor! Now with 3-D, zooming tiles and a larger playfield, you can see the tiles much more clearly.  You can also design layouts that zoom the tiles even more!  Play on smaller screens or from further away than was ever possible with the original game.
description.short: Price Drop! We took Mahjong Moves and improved it.  Better Visibility!  Over 50 Tile Sets!  Advanced Editor! Now with 3-D, zooming tiles and a larger playfield, you can see the tiles much more clearly.  You can also design layouts that zoom the tiles even more!  Play on smaller screens or from further away than was ever possible with the original game.
